blocks.text: Use distal ICA reference beyond the bulb. Stenosis (%) = (1 N / D) x 100.
Compare right vs. left or CTA vs. MRA. Leave blank if not needed.

items: NASCET formula: % stenosis = (1 N / D) x 100, where D is distal ICA diameter beyond bulb.
Severity bands: <50% mild, 50-69% moderate, 70-99% severe, 100% occluded.
Tips: Avoid bulb for reference; ensure similar spatial resolution between N and D; measure perpendicular to vessel centerline.
Reporting: Mention modality (CTA/MRA/DSA/US), side, % stenosis, and if string sign/near-occlusion suspected.
